languages.text: Над вереницей из сотни имен выгравирована надпись: "Тем, кто принес высшую жертву во имя династии, отдав не только жизнь, но и честь, и доброе имя. Я буду помнить вас".
Above the hundred different names is an engraved inscription: "To all who made the highest sacrifice for the dynasty and paid with their life, honour, and name: I will remember you."
languages.original_text: Над вереницей из сотни имен выгравирована надпись: "Тем, кто принес высшую жертву во имя династии, отдав не только жизнь, но и честь, и доброе имя. Я буду помнить вас".

traits.locale_text: There is an engraved inscription above a hundred different names: "To all who have made the highest sacrifice for the dynasty and paid with their life, honour, and name: I will remember you."
There is no name on the sarcophagus, only an inscription: "To all who have made the highest sacrifice for the dynasty and paid with their life, honour, and name: I will remember you."

Above the hundred different names is an engraved inscription: "To all who made the highest sacrifice for the dynasty and paid with their life, honour, and name: I will remember you."

languages.text: Au-dessus des centaines de noms différents est gravée une inscription : « À ceux qui ont fait le sacrifice ultime pour la dynastie et ont perdu leur vie, leur honneur et leur nom : je ne vous oublierai pas. »
languages.original_text: Above the hundred different names is an engraved inscription: "To all who made the highest sacrifice for the dynasty and paid with their life, honour, and name: I will remember you."

traits.locale_text: Au-dessus des centaines de noms différents est gravée une inscription : « À ceux qui ont fait le sacrifice ultime pour la dynastie et ont perdu leur vie, leur honneur et leur nom : je ne vous oublierai pas. »

languages.text: Encima del centenar de nombres distintos hay grabada una inscripción: «A todos los que han realizado el sacrificio definitivo por la dinastía y lo han pagado con su vida, honor y nombre: yo os recordaré».
languages.original_text: Above the hundred different names is an engraved inscription: "To all who made the highest sacrifice for the dynasty and paid with their life, honour, and name: I will remember you."

traits.locale_text: Encima del centenar de nombres distintos hay grabada una inscripción: «A todos los que han realizado el sacrificio definitivo por la dinastía y lo han pagado con su vida, honor y nombre: yo os recordaré».

languages.text: 几百个各自不同的名字上方，刻着这样的铭文——“献给所有为王朝做出崇高牺牲的人们，献给那些献出了生命、荣誉与名字的人们。我会记住你们。”
languages.original_text: Above the hundred different names is an engraved inscription: "To all who made the highest sacrifice for the dynasty and paid with their life, honour, and name: I will remember you."

traits.locale_text: 几百个各自不同的名字上方，刻着这样的铭文——“献给所有为王朝做出崇高牺牲的人们，献给那些献出了生命、荣誉与名字的人们。我会记住你们。”

languages.text: 100のさまざまな名前の上に碑文が刻まれている。 「王朝のために最高の犠牲を払い、その命と名誉と名を捧げたすべての者たちへ…お前たちを忘れはしない」
languages.original_text: Above the hundred different names is an engraved inscription: "To all who made the highest sacrifice for the dynasty and paid with their life, honour, and name: I will remember you."

traits.locale_text: 100のさまざまな名前の上に碑文が刻まれている。 「王朝のために最高の犠牲を払い、その命と名誉と名を捧げたすべての者たちへ…お前たちを忘れはしない」

languages.text: Über den hundert Namen ist eine Inschrift eingraviert: "An alle, die das höchste Opfer für die Dynastie erbracht haben und mit ihrem Leben, ihrer Ehre und ihrem Namen bezahlt haben: Ich werde mich an euch erinnern."
languages.original_text: Above the hundred different names is an engraved inscription: "To all who made the highest sacrifice for the dynasty and paid with their life, honour, and name: I will remember you."

traits.locale_text: Über den hundert Namen ist eine Inschrift eingraviert: "An alle, die das höchste Opfer für die Dynastie erbracht haben und mit ihrem Leben, ihrer Ehre und ihrem Namen bezahlt haben: Ich werde mich an euch erinnern."

languages.text: Yüzden fazla ismin üzerine işlenmiş yazı şöyle diyor: "Hanedanlığı için en büyük fedakârlığı yapan ve yaşamını, onurunu ve ismini feda edenlere: Sizi unutmayacağım."
languages.original_text: Above the hundred different names is an engraved inscription: "To all who made the highest sacrifice for the dynasty and paid with their life, honour, and name: I will remember you."
